title: Video Premiere: Tenterhook – Stereo
content:
London’s Tenterhook aka Archie Faulks cropped up on quite a few radars earlier in the year with his stunning debut offering, Stereo.

Having followed it up with a couple of sold out shows, and a second track, Chemicals, he’s now released a fitting video for his debut, perfectly mirroring the tender, delicate atmosphere of the track itself. With a rapidly growing fan base, and a self-titled EP out 25 August, expect Tenterhook to make serious inroads in 2015. Check out the beautiful video for Stereo (directed by Jessica Hughes) below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
